name: pretty-easy-date-check
description: Check if a supplied value is a valid Date (instanceof Date or a valid string representation of a date that can be turned into one by instantiating Date class).
author: Ognjen JevremoviÄ‡ <jevremovic.ognjen@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ognjenjevremovic)

scripts.compile: npm run remove:compiled && npm run tsc && npm run move:test && npm run move:base
scripts.remove:compiled: npm run remove:dist && npm run remove:tests
scripts.remove:tests: rm -f tests/*.js && rm -f tests/*.js.map && rm -f tests/*.d.ts && rm -f tests/**/*.js && rm -f tests/**/*.js.map && rm -f tests/**/*.d.ts
